title: Kevin McKenna on Characters, Plot, and Themes of In the First Circle
description: Russian Literature Professor Kevin McKenna of the University of Vermont talks with EconTalk host Russ Roberts about the characters, plot, and themes of Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn's masterpiece, In the First Circle. This is the second episode of the EconTalk book club discussing the book. The first episode--a discussion of Solzhenitsyn's life and times--is available on EconTalk.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (Library of Economics and Liberty)
